page.title: 12N. Bransholme, population.
page.content:
Over{75%}of the children (9-13) have moved from other parts of the city. Some do not stay long as their parents prefare to move back into the rebuild city centre and areas around the fish docks or the more established areas of the city.
The following survey was carried out on 364 children of the area:-
{Place of origin No. children % N. Bransholme 48 13.0 S. Bransholme 76 20.8 East Hull 99 27.0 North Hull 62 17.0 West Hull 60 16.4 Humberside (rest) 5 1.3 England (rest) 10 2.7 Abroad 4 1.0
